OpenAPI Spec in YAML
### Offboarding Every service conntected to Gr√ºnes Netz needs to remove users when they are removed from `saml.gruene.de`. Connected services need to pull a list of users waiting for removal at least once a week. api.gruene.de needs to be informed whether the user did not exist or was removed. API tokens can be obtained from `technik@verdigado.com`.
